question: How can I purchase the listing plan?
answer: Sign up, then choose your paid listing plan to unlock the full power of Zippwaste.

question: Can I cancel anytime?
answer: Absolutely. There are no long-term contracts or cancellation fees. You can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings, and you'll retain access until the end of your current billing period.

question: What is ZippWorks Media?
answer: ZippWorks Media is a division of ZippWaste LLC that specializes in building professional websites exclusively for the waste industry. We design and manage tailored sites for dumpster rental and junk removal companies, combining clean design with proven functionality.

question: How does your pricing work?
answer: We offer clear flat pricing with no surprises. You pay a one-time setup fee to get your website built, then a monthly fee for hosting, maintenance, and ongoing support. No hidden costs or unexpected charges.

question: What's included in every website package?
answer: Every package includes custom design, hosting, mobile-friendly setup, SSL security, ongoing technical support, secure hosting, and basic SEO setup so your site is ready for search engines. Advanced features like booking software integrations and CRM connections are included in our Pro plan.

question: What’s the difference between Basic and Enhanced SEO?
answer: SEO (Search Engine Optimization) means improving your website so it can show up higher in Google and other search engines. All ZippWorks sites include a Basic SEO setup — titles, meta descriptions, clean structure, image alt tags, and a site that’s fast, secure, and mobile-friendly. The Enhanced SEO in our Growth plan adds tools to help you rank for more keywords, like a blog/news section for SEO content and extra service/city pages. Our Pro plan takes it further with monthly SEO reviews and recommendations to keep improving your rankings over time.

question: Do I need to handle any technical maintenance?
answer: No technical headaches for you! We handle everything - keeping your site secure, updated, and working properly. You can focus on hauling and service while we manage your website completely.

question: What about content changes?
answer: Technical maintenance is unlimited in all plans. Content edits depend on your plan:
plans: Starter: content edits are billed separately.
Growth: 1 small content edit included per month.
Pro: faster turnaround & more flexibility with content updates, plus monthly SEO recommendations.

question: Why should I choose ZippWorks Media over other web designers?
answer: We specialize exclusively in the waste industry, so we understand your business needs. We provide everything your business needs to look professional online, attract more leads, and stay ahead of the competition - all while you focus on what you do best.
